page.title: 06SUTTON SCHOOL PLAYTIME
page.content:
Playground Games We like to play games together in our school playground.Our favourites are chasing games.
BRITISH BULLDOG This game is played in a certain area. 3 or more people can play. One person is "IT" and stands in the middle of a rectangle.The other players have to cross the rectangle without being caught by the person in the middle.If anyone is caught,"IT" taps them on the shoulder and says"British Bulldog 1-2-3".That person then has to help catch the others.When everyone is caught,the person who was caught first becomes the new "IT".
